dbQuery.query: SELECT ID, OBJ_CLS_ID CODE,TOPOLOGY_ID TOPO,NOMENCLATURE,DESCR,CLASSIFIER_ID,C1,C4,C7,C9,C11,C32,C33,C34,C47,C220,C221,C2,C3,C5,C10,C15,C27,C28,C35,C36,C40,C57,C309,C699,C12,C25,CTIME,CUSER_ID,CUSER,MTIME,MUSER_ID,MUSER FROM WEB50.M_100_GIDR_LP WHERE {FILTER}

SELECT ID, OBJ_CLS_ID CODE,TOPOLOGY_ID TOPO,NOMENCLATURE,DESCR,CLASSIFIER_ID,C4,C7,C9,C33,C5,C32,C309,C3,C34,C47,C36,C304,CTIME,CUSER_ID,CUSER,MTIME,MUSER_ID,MUSER FROM WEB50.M_100_GIDR_S WHERE {FILTER}

SELECT ID, OBJ_CLS_ID CODE,TOPOLOGY_ID TOPO,NOMENCLATURE,DESCR,CLASSIFIER_ID,C1,C4,C9,C7,C16,C57,C84,C607,C73,C699,C47,C15,CTIME,CUSER_ID,CUSER,MTIME,MUSER_ID,MUSER FROM WEB50.M_100_RELIEF WHERE {FILTER}

SELECT ID, OBJ_CLS_ID CODE,TOPOLOGY_ID TOPO,NOMENCLATURE,DESCR,CLASSIFIER_ID,C2,C10,C11,C12,C46,C51,C53,C54,C55,C1,C3,C7,C9,C15,C44,C57,C84,C87,C130,C604,C699,C6,C50,C47,C58,C97,C218,C309,CTIME,CUSER_ID,CUSER,MTIME,MUSER_ID,MUSER FROM WEB50.M_100_ROADS WHERE {FILTER}
SELECT ID, OBJ_CLS_ID CODE,TOPOLOGY_ID TOPO,NOMENCLATURE,DESCR,CLASSIFIER_ID,C4,C9,C20,C16,C69,C84,CTIME,CUSER_ID,CUSER,MTIME,MUSER_ID,MUSER FROM WEB50.M_100_SURVEY WHERE {FILTER}

SELECT ID, OBJ_CLS_ID CODE,TOPOLOGY_ID TOPO,NOMENCLATURE,DESCR,CLASSIFIER_ID,C1,C4,C7,C9,C11,C32,C33,C34,C47,C220,C221,C2,C3,C5,C10,C15,C27,C28,C35,C36,C40,C57,C309,C699,C12,C25,C47,C304,CTIME,CUSER_ID,CUSER,MTIME,MUSER_ID,MUSER FROM WEB50.M_100_SWAMP WHERE {FILTER}

SELECT ID, OBJ_CLS_ID CODE,TOPOLOGY_ID TOPO,NOMENCLATURE,DESCR,CLASSIFIER_ID,C3,C9,C38,C39,C47,C40,C43,C57,C72,C130,C138,C243,C604,C699,C309,C1,C11,C16,C46,C53,C55,C89,CTIME,CUSER_ID,CUSER,MTIME,MUSER_ID,MUSER FROM WEB50.M_100_TOWN WHERE {FILTER}

dbCommand.query: DO $$ BEGIN DELETE FROM WEB50.M_100_NOM_TO_SRV_DISTRICT WHERE NOMENCLATURE = '{ID}'; DELETE FROM WEB50.M_100_NOMENCLATURE_REF WHERE NOMENCLATURE = '{ID}'; END $$;
